content: all round 18 p all round 19 - 20 k all round 21 p all round 22 k 35 pm k 70 pm k to end repeat k rounds for 1 inch *ssk k to 2 sts before the next marker k2tog sm* repeat two more times 134 sts repeat k rounds until section is 2 inches *ssk k to 2 sts before the next marker k2tog sm* repeat two more times 128 sts section 3 round 1 - 2 k all round 3 p all round 4 - 5 k all round 6 p all round 7 - 8 k all round 9 p all round 10 - 11 k all round 12 *k2tog yo* to the end of the round marker round 13 - 14 k all round 15 p all round 16 - 17 k all round 18 p all round 19 - 20 k all round 21 p all ©orangejellyfish by sarah raasch all rights reserved orangejellyfishdream@gmail com �4 of �5 round 22 k all repeat k rounds for 1 more inch *ssk k to 2 sts before the next marker k2tog sm* repeat two more times 122 sts repeat k rounds until section is 2 inches *ssk k to 2 sts before the next marker k2tog sm* repeat two more times 116 sts section 4 round 1 - 2 k all round 3 p all round 4 - 5 k all round 6 p all round 7 - 8 k all round 9 p all round 10 - 11 k all round 12 *k2tog yo* to the end of the round round 13 - 14 k all round 15 p all round 16 - 17 k all round 18 p all round 19 - 20 k all round 21 p all round 22 - 23 k all bind off bind off loosely or with larger needles making sure to provide a slight stretch finishing weave in ends and block stretch cowl from top to bottom for added length and only stretch slightly width wise to open eyelets let dry ©orangejellyfish by sarah raasch all rights reserved orangejellyfishdream@gmail com �5 of �5
